TEXT.TITLE: WASHINGTON ENERGY <WECO> PLANS PUBLIC OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Washington Energy Co said it plans to file a registration statement later this month covering a planned public offering of 1.2 mln common shares. Proceeds from the offering will be used to reduce short-term bank borrowings incurred to finance capital expenditures, the company said. Reuter
